name: Friday Night Funkin B-Sides Optimized (chromebook_gamerwastaken)
description:
original mod: https://gamebanana.com/mods/42724

v0.0.1: b side mod is added! now this has just got funky, notes: i found a very weird glitch in week 6, that f you die and spam the backspace button, it softlocks the game, and tutorial softlocks too (idk if it only softlocks in hard cuz i only tested it in hard difficulty)
